short_phrases.description: 0Below follow short generic phrases that can be reused

c_ps_slogan.message: 0Flexible start page that makes your data available in a single view.

c_about_text_0.message: 0Here you can like, review and rate the extension.

c_about_title_1.message: 0Spread the Word with e-mail to a Friend

c_about_text_1.message: 0Click here to generate a mail to a friend. If it does not work, copy the link to chrome webstore above.

c_about_text_2.message: 0If you have any idea for a widget you would like to develop, the code is on GitHub. Here you can also submit bugs and issues.

c_about_title_3.message: 0Bugs, Ideas or Questions in Google Groups

c_about_text_3.message: 0Use Google Groups to ask questions, and submit ideas and bugs.

c_help_text_0.message: 0You can configure what data goes where through the options menu.

c_help_text_1.message: 0he columns and content adjusts to give best viewing experience for all screen widths.

c_help_text_2.message: 0The page consists of three columns, but for smaller screens the right column merges with the center column to allow the content to be usable.

Widgets.description: Below Follow all widget specific translation. Prefix w_xx where xx is the widget label

w_bookmarkTree_help.message:
A Treeview of all the bookmarks, with full text search.
Note: You select the Quicklinks from here by right clicking the folder you want to get your quicklinks from.
Click edit button to get bookmark editor.

w_chromeApps_help.message:
A list of chrome apps presently installed in the browser.
Note: only apps with a page are listed.

w_closedTabs_help.message:
Recently closed tabs.
Note: Is cleared by chrome each time the browser is closed.

w_quicklinks_help.message:
A list of links chosen by the user. The links are chosen by right clicking a folder in the bookmark tree.
Note: You can only select one folder and only the bookmarks directly in that folder are shown, not in sub folders.

w_rssFeed_help.message: You have what ever feeds you want here, e.g. news feeds

w_rssFeed_auth_text.message: 0RSS uses google apis to get a consistent data structure from the various feeds and will not function without. Click here to proceed and authorize the widget.
